top_stories.title: Nvidia acquires 5 billion dollar stake in Intel for strategic alliance
top_stories.description: Intel and Nvidia have officially formalized a strategic partnership involving a $5 billion stock transaction, a deal first agreed upon in September by CEOs Jensen Huang and Lip-Bu Tan. Regulatory filings confirm that Nvidia acquired approximately 215 million Intel shares at a fixed price of $23.28 per share. With Intel’s stock recently trading near $38, […]
top_stories.author: Aytun Çelebi
top_stories.content: Intel and Nvidia have officially formalized a strategic partnership involving a $5 billion stock transaction, a deal first agreed upon in September by CEOs Jensen Huang and Lip-Bu Tan. top_stories.title: Tencent Released Tencent HY-Motion 1.0: A Billion-Parameter Text-to-Motion Model Built on the Diffusion Transformer (DiT) Architecture and Flow Matching
top_stories.description: Tencent Hunyuan’s 3D Digital Human team has released HY-Motion 1.0, an open weight text-to-3D human motion generation family that scales Diffusion Transformer based Flow Matching to 1B parameters in the motion domain. The models turn natural language prompts plus an expected duration into 3D human motion clips on a unified SMPL-H skeleton and are available […] The post Tencent Released Tencent HY-Motion 1.0: A Billion-Parameter Text-to-Motion Model Built on the Diffusion Transformer (DiT)...
top_stories.author: Asif Razzaq
top_stories.content: Tencent Hunyuan’s 3D Digital Human team has released HY-Motion 1.0, an open weight text-to-3D human motion generation family that scales Diffusion Transformer based Flow Matching to 1B parameters in the motion domain. The models turn natural language prompts plus an expected duration into 3D human motion clips on a unified SMPL-H skeleton and are available […] The post Tencent Released Tencent HY-Motion 1.0: A Billion-Parameter Text-to-Motion Model Built on the Diffusion Transformer (DiT)...

top_stories.title: Programmatically creating an IDP solution with Amazon Bedrock Data Automation
top_stories.description: In this post, we explore how to programmatically create an IDP solution that uses Strands SDK, Amazon Bedrock AgentCore, Amazon Bedrock Knowledge Base, and Bedrock Data Automation (BDA). This solution is provided through a Jupyter notebook that enables users to upload multi-modal business documents and extract insights using BDA as a parser to retrieve relevant chunks and augment a prompt to a foundational model (FM).
top_stories.author: Raian Osman
top_stories.content: In this post, we explore how to programmatically create an IDP solution that uses Strands SDK, Amazon Bedrock AgentCore, Amazon Bedrock Knowledge Base, and Bedrock Data Automation (BDA). This solution is provided through a Jupyter notebook that enables users to upload multi-modal business documents and extract insights using BDA as a parser to retrieve relevant chunks and augment a prompt to a foundational model (FM).

top_stories.title: Foundation Models as the Backbone of Next-Gen AI Platforms
top_stories.description: Foundation models as the backbone of next-gen AI platforms, reshaping enterprise AI architecture, governance, and scale. One signal breaks through the AI noise in 2026: most enterprise AI budgets are no longer allocated to applications. They are spent on platforms.
